channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cuzen Electric Matcha Maker Review: Great Tea but a Lazy Design
item.description: This kitchen gadget provides a way to brew incredibly fresh matcha, but it's really just a glorified tea leaf grinder.

item.title: 13 Best Housewarming Gifts for Any New Home
item.description: Make a house into a home with these gifts, whether they're moving into their first house or a great new apartment.

item.title: Dropbox is laying off 20% of its staff

item.title: Bifrost helps industrials speed up model training with its 3D data generation platform
item.description: For many companies working on AI models with applications in the physical world, data presents the biggest opportunity. It’s also the biggest hurdle t...

item.title: OpenAI’s Transcription Tool Hallucinates. Hospitals Are Using It Anyway
item.description: In health care settings, it’s important to be precise. That’s why the widespread use of OpenAI’s Whisper transcription tool among medical workers has ...

item.title: Hummingbirds, a platform that connects local creators with brand campaigns in their area, raises $5.4M
item.description: Hummingbirds is a female-founded startup that connects hyperlocal content creators with locally-based brands that reward them for sharing products wit...

item.title: Kindle Colorsoft Review: A Color E-Reader and Not Much Else
item.description: The first color Kindle is a nice upgrade, but Amazon missed out on a few opportunities to make the Colorsoft even more special.

item.title: Amazon Kindle Colorsoft review: A muted approach to color

item.title: Donald Trump's Ground Game in Michigan Is Mostly Glitchy Apps and Vibes
item.description: "It’s what happens when you let a bunch of grifters take over,” a Trumpworld source said. Still, the polls remain even.
